areas.caption: Svæðaskrá
areas.description: Yfirlit yfir öll svæði á heimilinu þínu.

picker.introduction: Svæði eru notuð til að skipuleggja hvar tæki eru staðsett. Þessar upplýsingar verða notaðar innan Home Assistant til að hjálpa þér að skipuleggja viðmótið, réttindi og samþættingar við önnur kerfi.
picker.introduction2: Til að staðsetja tæki inn á tilteknu svæði þá skal notast við hlekkinn hér fyrir neðan til að vafra yfir á samþættingarsíðu og þar smella á stillta samþættingu til að fá upp spjaldið fyrir tækið.
picker.no_areas: Það lýtur út fyrir að þú sért ekki með nein svæði ennþá!

editor.name: Nafn
editor.no_linked_entities: There are no entities linked to this area.
editor.aliases_description: Samnöfn eru önnur nöfn sem notuð eru í raddaðstoð til að vísa til þessa svæðis.

delete.confirmation_text: This area will be permanently deleted and all devices belonging to this area will become unassigned.

detail.name: Nafn
detail.usage: A tag can trigger an automation when scanned, you can use NFC tags, QR codes or any other kind of tag. Use our {companion_link} to write this tag to a programmable NFC tag or create a QR code below.

energy.caption: Orka
energy.new_device_info: After setting up a new device, it can take up to 2 hours for new data to arrive in your energy dashboard.
energy.delete_source: Are you sure you want to delete this source?
energy.delete_integration: Are you sure you want to delete this integration? It will remove the entities it provides

grid.title: Raforkukerfi
grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows NDX Tech to track your whole home energy usage.
grid.learn_more: Nánari upplýsingar um hvernig á að byrja.

from.paragraph: Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
from.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures grid consumption in either of {unit}.
from.cost_para: Select how NDX Tech should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
from.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total costs
from.cost_entity: Use an entity with current price

to.paragraph: Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
to.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures grid production in either of {unit}.
to.cost_para: Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
to.no_cost: Ég fæ ekki peninga til baka
to.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total received money
to.cost_entity: Use an entity with current rate

solar.title: Sólarsellur
solar.sub: Let NDX Tech monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
solar.learn_more: Nánari upplýsingar um hvernig á að byrja.
solar.stat_return_to_grid: Solar energy returned to the grid
solar.stat_predicted_production: Prediction of your solar energy production

dialog.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures solar energy production in either of {unit}.
dialog.solar_production_forecast_description: Adding solar production forecast information will allow you to quickly see your expected production for today.

battery.title: Rafhlöðugeymsla heimilis
battery.sub: Ef þú ert með rafhlöðukerfi geturðu stillt það til að fylgjast með hversu mikil orka var geymd og vistuð í rafhlöðunni þinni.
battery.learn_more: Nánari upplýsingar um hvernig á að byrja.

dialog.entity_para: Pick sensors which measure energy going in to and out of the battery in either of {unit}.
dialog.energy_into_battery: Energy going in to the battery
dialog.energy_out_of_battery: Orka að koma út úr rafhlöðunni

gas.title: Gas notkun
gas.sub: Leyfðu Home Assistant að fylgjast með gasnotkun þinni.
gas.learn_more: Nánari upplýsingar um hvernig á að byrja.

dialog.paragraph: Gas consumption is measured either as the volume of gas that flows to your home or as the amount of energy contained in the gas.
dialog.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures gas consumption in either of {unit}.
dialog.note_para: Note: It is not possible to add both sensors measuring a volume of gas and sensors measuring the amount of energy contained in the gas.
dialog.cost_para: Select how NDX Tech should keep track of the costs of the consumed gas.
dialog.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total costs
dialog.cost_entity: Use an entity with current price

water.title: Vatnsnotkun
water.sub: Leyfðu Home Assistant að fylgjast með vatnsnotkun þinni.
water.learn_more: Nánari upplýsingar um hvernig á að byrja.

dialog.paragraph: Vatnsnotkun er það magn af vatni sem flæðir í gegnum heimilið þitt.
dialog.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures water consumption in either of {unit}.
dialog.cost_para: Veldu hvernig Home Assistant á að fylgjast með kostnaði á vatnsnotkun.
dialog.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total costs
dialog.cost_entity: Use an entity with current price

device_consumption.title: Einstök tæki
device_consumption.sub: Það að fylgjast með orkunotkun á einstökum tækjum gerir Home Assistant kleyft að fylgjast með orkunotkun á hverju tæki fyrir sig.
device_consumption.learn_more: Nánari upplýsingar um hvernig á að byrja.

core.caption: Almennt
core.description: Staðfesta að stillingarskráin þín sé rétt og stjórnun á miðlara

core.introduction: Að breyta stillingum getur verið þreytandi ferli og við vitum það. Þetta svæði mun reyna að létta þér lífið hvað það varðar.

core_config.edit_requires_storage: Ritill er óvirkur af því að stillingar eru vistaðar í configuration.yaml.

core_config.update_units_confirm_text: The unit system has been changed, and the unit of some sensors like distance and speed will be updated.

assistants.text: Control all your NDX Tech devices via any Google Assistant-enabled or Alexa-enabled device.

speech.title: Amazing speech options for Assist

picker.introduction: The automation editor allows you to create and edit automations. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured NDX Tech correctly.
picker.pick_automation: Veldu sjálfvirkni sem á að breyta
picker.no_automations: Við fundum ekki neinar sjálfvirkni-skilgreiningar sem hægt er að breyta
picker.only_editable: Eingöngu er hægt að breyta sjálfvirkni sem skilgreind er í automations.yaml
picker.dev_only_editable: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.
picker.traces_not_available: Automations need an ID for history to be tracked. Add an ID to your automation to make it available in traces.
picker.empty_text_1: Automations make NDX Tech automatically respond to things happening in and around your home.
picker.empty_text_2: Automations connect triggers to actions in a ''when trigger then action'' fashion with optional conditions. For example: ''When the sun sets and if {user} is home, then turn on the lights''.

dialog_new.create_empty_description: Start with an empty automation from scratch

editor.read_only: This automation cannot be edited from the UI, because it is not stored in the automations.yaml file, or doesn't have an ID.
editor.missing_name: Get ekki vistað sjálfvirkni án nafns
editor.traces_not_available: Automations need an ID for history to be tracked. Add an ID to your automation to make it available in traces.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Eingöngu er hægt að breyta sjálfvirkni í automations.yaml
editor.load_error_not_deletable: Only automations in automations.yaml can be deleted.
editor.load_error_unknown: Villa kom upp við að hlaða inn sjálfvirkni  ({err_no}).

triggers.name: Triggers
triggers.description: This list of triggers is what starts your automation. A trigger is a specific event happening in or around your home, for example: ''When the sun sets''.

entity.label: Entity
entity.description: When something happens to an entity.

time_location.label: Time and location
time_location.description: When someone enters or leaves a zone, or at a specific time.

description.picker: When a calendar event starts or ends.
When something happens to a device. Great way to start.
When an event is being received (event is an advanced concept in NDX Tech).
description.full: When {eventTypes} event is fired

description.picker: When an entity created by a geolocation platform appears in or disappears from a zone.
When the state of an entity (or attribute) changes.
When NDX Tech starts up or shuts down.

description.shutdown: Þegar slökkt er á Home Assistant

description.picker: When a specific message is received on a given MQTT topic.

description.picker: When the numeric value of an entity''s state (or attribute''s value) crosses a given threshold.
When a persistent notification is added or removed.
description.full: When a persistent notification is updated

description.picker: When the sun sets or rises.

description.picker: When someone (or something) enters or leaves a zone.

conditions.name: Conditions
conditions.description: This list of conditions needs to be satisfied for the automation to run. A condition can be satisfied or not at any given time, for example: ''If {user} is home''. You can use building blocks to create more complex conditions.

entity.label: Entity
entity.description: If an entity is in a specific state.

time_location.label: Time and location
time_location.description: If someone is in a zone or if the current time is before or after a specified time.

description.picker: Test if multiple conditions are true.
Set of conditions provided by your device. Great way to start.
Test if a condition is not true.
description.one_condition: Test if 1 condition does not match
description.full: Test if none of {count} conditions match

description.picker: If the numeric value of an entity''s state (or attribute''s value) is above or below a given threshold.
Test if any condition is true.
If an entity (or attribute) is in a specific state.
If the sun is above or below the horizon.
If a template evaluates to true.
description.full: Test if template renders a value equal to true

time.type_input: Value of a date/time helper or timestamp-class sensor
time.label: Tími

description.picker: If the current time is before or after a specified time.

trigger.label: Ræst af
trigger.no_triggers: No triggers have an ID set. You can set an ID using the trigger menu button.

description.picker: If the automation has been triggered by a specific trigger.
description.full: When triggered by {id}

description.picker: If someone (or something) is in a zone.

actions.name: Actions
actions.description: This list of actions will be performed in sequence when the automation runs. An action usually controls one of your areas, devices, or entities, for example: 'Turn on the lights'. You can use building blocks to create more complex sequences of actions.

building_blocks.label: Building blocks
building_blocks.description: Build more complex sequences of actions.

service.label: Kalla í þjónustu
service.has_optional_response: This service can return a response, if you want to use the response, enter the name of a variable the response will be saved in
service.has_response: This service returns a response, enter the name of a variable the response will be saved in

Test a condition (and stop the sequence if the condition is not met).

description.picker: Do something on a device. Great way to start.
Repeat a sequence of actions.

Do something conditionally.

Define variables to be used later in the sequence.

Prófa {condition}

overview.introduction: Stjórnun uppdrátta gerir þér kleift að flytja inn og stjórna uppdráttunum þínum.

picker.introduction: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured NDX Tech correctly.
picker.empty_text: A script is a sequence of actions that can be run from a dashboard, an automation, or be triggered by voice. For example, a ''Wake-up routine''' script that gradually turns on the light in the bedroom and opens the blinds after a delay.

dialog_new.create_empty_description: Start with an empty script from scratch

editor.id_already_exists_save_error: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.
editor.introduction: Use scripts to run a sequence of actions.
editor.read_only: This script cannot be edited from the UI, because it is not stored in the ''scripts.yaml'' file.

field.name: Name
field.key_not_null: The field key must not be empty.
field.key_not_unique: The field key must not be the same value as another field.

editor.load_error_not_editable: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
editor.load_error_not_deletable: Only scripts in scripts.yaml can be deleted.
editor.sequence_sentence: The sequence of actions of this script.

picker.introduction: The scene editor allows you to create and edit scenes. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured NDX Tech correctly.
picker.only_editable: Það er eingöngu hægt að breyta senum skilgreindum í scenes.yaml.
picker.empty_text: Scenes capture entities' states, so you can re-experience the same scene later on. For example, a ''Watching TV'' scene that dims the living room lights, sets a warm white color and turns on the TV.

editor.load_error_not_editable: Það er eingöngu hægt að breyta senum í scenes.yaml.
editor.name: Nafn

devices.introduction: Add the devices that you want to be included in your scene. Set all entities in each device to the state you want for this scene.

entities.introduction: Individual entities can be added here.

cloud.description_features: Stjórna heimili að heiman með Alexa og Google Assistant.

login.title: Skýja innskráning
login.introduction: NDX Tech Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
login.introduction2: Þessi þjónusta er rekin af samstarfsaðila okkar
login.introduction2a: , fyrirtæki stofnað af stofnendum Home Assistant.
login.introduction3: Home Assistant skýið er áskriftarþjónusta með mánaðar prufuáskrift. Engar greiðsluupplýsingar nauðsynlegar.
login.learn_more_link: Læra meira um Home Assistant skýið
login.password_error_msg: Lykilorð eru að minnsta kosti 8 stafir
login.alert_password_change_required: Þú verður að breyta lykilorðinu þínu áður en þú skráir þig inn.
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: Þú þarft að staðfesta tölvupóstinn þinn áður en þú skráir þig inn.
login.cloud_pipeline_title: Viltu nota Home Assistant Cloud fyrir raddaðstoð?
login.cloud_pipeline_text: We created a new assistant for you, using the superior text-to-speech and speech-to-text engines from NDX Tech Cloud. Would you like to set this assistant as the preferred assistant?

forgot_password.title: Gleymt lykilorð
forgot_password.subtitle: Gleymdirðu lykilorðinu þínu
forgot_password.instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

register.title: Register Account
register.headline: Start your free trial
register.information: Create an account to start your free one month trial with NDX Tech Cloud. No payment information necessary.
register.information2: The trial will give you access to all the benefits of NDX Tech Cloud, including:
register.feature_webhook_apps: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
register.information3: This service is run by our partner
register.information3a: , fyrirtæki stofnað af stofnendum Home Assistant.
register.information4: By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
register.password_error_msg: Lykilorð eru að minnsta kosti 8 stafir
register.account_created: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.

account.thank_you_note: Thank you for being part of NDX Tech Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
account.sign_out_confirm: Ertu viss um að þú viljir skrá þig út?
account.integrations_introduction: Integrations for NDX Tech Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your NDX Tech instance publicly on the internet.
account.tip_moved_voice_assistants: Ertu að leita að Google Assistant og Amazon Alexa stillingum? Þau eru flutt á nýju síðuna fyrir raddaðstoð.

tts.title: Texti yfir í tal
tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our text-to-speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.

dialog.example_message: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!

remote.title: Fjarstýring

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for NDX Tech Cloud you'll be able to control all your NDX Tech devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Enable the NDX Tech skill for Alexa
alexa.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, NDX Tech will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
alexa.manual_config: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
alexa.not_configured_text: Before you can use Alexa, you need to activate the NDX Tech skill for Alexa in the Alexa app.
alexa.expose_new_entities_info: Should new entities be exposed to Alexa automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.info: With the Google Assistant integration for NDX Tech Cloud, you'll be able to control all your NDX Tech devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
google.http_use_ssl_warning_text: Google devices will not be able to talk locally with NDX Tech, because you have configured an SSL certificate for your HTTP integration.
google.enable_ha_skill: Activate the NDX Tech Cloud skill for Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, NDX Tech will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This speeds up voice commands and allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
google.enter_pin_info: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors, and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with security devices via Google Assistant.
google.enter_pin_hint: Sláðu in PIN kóða til að nota öryggistæki
google.manual_config: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
google.enter_pin_error: Ekki tókst að vista pin kóða:
google.not_configured_title: Google Assistant hefur ekki verið virkjaður
google.not_configured_text: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the NDX Tech Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
google.expose_new_entities_info: Should new entities be exposed to Google Assistant automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.info: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to NDX Tech from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
webhooks.link_learn_more: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

dialog_cloudhook.managed_by_integration: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
dialog_cloudhook.info_disable_webhook: If you no longer want to use this webhook, you can

devices.enabled_description: Óvirk tæki verða ekki sýnd, einingar sem tilheyra tækinu verða gerðar óvirkar og þeim ekki bætt við Home Assistant.

automation.create_disable: Get ekki búið til sjálfvirkni með óvirka {type}

actions.caption: Þegar eitthvað er ræst af kveikju…

automation.no_device_automations: Það eru engar keyrslur til fyrir þetta tæki

script.create_disable: Get ekki búið til skriftu með óvirka {type}

scene.create_disable: Get ekki búið til senu með óvirka {type}

devices.cant_edit: You can only edit items that are created in the UI.
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids: Do you also want to rename the entity IDs of your entities?
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids_warning: This will not change any configuration (like automations, scripts, scenes, dashboards) that is currently using these entities! You will have to update them yourself to use the new entity IDs!
devices.confirm_disable_config_entry: There are no more devices for the config entry {entry_name}, do you want to instead disable the config entry?
devices.confirm_delete: Ertu viss um að þú viljir eyða þessu tæki?
devices.confirm_delete_integration: Are you sure you want to remove this device from {integration}?

picker.introduction: Home Assistant heldur bókhald utanum allar einingar sem verið greindar. Hver þessara eininga hafa einingar-auðkenni (ID) sem er frátekið bara fyrir þessa tilteknu einingu.
picker.introduction2: Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from NDX Tech.

enable_selected.confirm_text: This will make them available in NDX Tech again if they are now disabled.

disable_selected.confirm_text: Disabled entities will not be added to NDX Tech.

remove_selected.confirm_text: You should remove them from your dashboard config and automations if they contain these entities.
remove_selected.confirm_partly_text: You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart NDX Tech before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?

hide_selected.confirm_text: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard. Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with services.

person.caption: Fólk
person.description: Stjórna persónum sem Home assistant er að rekja.
person.introduction: Hér getur þú skilgreint þær persónur sem eiga að vera í Home Assistant.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: People configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Það lítur út fyrir að þú hafir ekki búið til neina einstaklinga ennþá.
person.confirm_delete_text: This person will be permanently deleted and all devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
person.person_not_found: Við fundum ekki manneskjuna sem þú varst að reyna að breyta.

detail.name: Nafn
detail.device_tracker_intro: Veldu tæki sem tilheyrir þessari persónu.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.
detail.confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete the user account for {name}? You can still track the user, but the person will no longer be able to login.
detail.local_only: Getur eingöngu skráð sig inn á staðarneti
detail.allow_login: Leyfa persónu að skrá sig inn

zone.caption: Svæði
zone.description: Manage the zones you want to track people in
zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on Earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.
zone.no_zones_created_yet: Looks like you have not added any zones yet.
zone.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this zone?
zone.configured_in_yaml: Zones configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
zone.edit_home_zone: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Drag the marker on the map to move the home zone.
zone.edit_home_zone_narrow: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
zone.home_zone_core_config: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?

detail.name: Nafn
detail.icon_error_msg: Táknmyndin ætti að vera á forminu forskeyti:nafn_a_taknmynd, til dæmis: mdi:home
detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.

integrations.confirm_new: Do you want to set up {integration}?
integrations.no_integrations: Seems like you don't have any integrations configured yet. Click on the button below to add your first integration!
integrations.note_about_integrations: Það er ekki er hægt að stilla allar samþættingar í gegnum viðmótið ennþá.
integrations.rename_dialog: Edit the name of this config entry
integrations.what_device_type: What type of device is it?
integrations.what_to_add: What do you want to add?
integrations.confirm_add_discovered: Want to add these discovered devices?

ignore.confirm_ignore: Are you sure you don't want to set up this integration? You can undo this by clicking the 'Show ignored integrations' in the overflow menu on the top right.
ignore.confirm_delete_ignore: This will make the integration appear in your discovered integrations again when it gets discovered. This might require a restart or take some time.

application_credentials.delete_prompt: Would you like to also remove Application Credentials for this integration?
application_credentials.delete_detail: If you remove them, you will need to enter credentials when setting up the integration again. If you keep them, they will be used automatically when setting up the integration again or may be acccessed from the Application Credentials menu.

config_entry.delete_confirm_text: Its devices and entities will be permanently deleted.
config_entry.restart_confirm: Endurræsa Home Assitant til að klára að fjarlægja þessa samþættingu
config_entry.reload_restart_confirm: Restart NDX Tech to finish reloading this integration
config_entry.disable_restart_confirm: Restart NDX Tech to finish disabling this integration
config_entry.enable_restart_confirm: Restart NDX Tech to finish enabling this integration
config_entry.disable_confirm_text: Its devices and entities will be disabled.
config_entry.disable_error: Enabling or disabling of the integration failed
config_entry.disabled_polling: Automatic polling for updated data disabled

config_flow.yaml_only_title: Þessu tæki er ekki hægt að bæta við í grafíska viðmótinu
config_flow.yaml_only: You can add this device by adding it to your ''configuration.yaml''. See the documentation for more information.
config_flow.no_config_flow: This integration does not support configuration via the UI. If you followed this link from the NDX Tech website, make sure you run the latest version of NDX Tech.
config_flow.not_all_required_fields: Not all required fields are filled in.

external_step.description: Þetta skref krefst þess að þú heimsækir ytri vefsíðu svo hægt sé að ljúka þessu skrefi.

loading.loading_flow: Vinsamlegast hinkrið meðan {integration} er í uppsetningu.

config_flow.could_not_load: Config flow could not be loaded
config_flow.not_loaded: The integration could not be loaded, try to restart NDX Tech.
config_flow.supported_brand_flow: Support for {supported_brand} devices is provided by {flow_domain_name}. Do you want to continue?
config_flow.missing_zwave_zigbee: To add a {brand} device, you first need {supported_hardware_link} and the {integration} integration set up. If you already have the hardware then you can proceed with the setup of {integration}.
config_flow.missing_matter: To add a {brand} device, you first need the {integration} integration and {supported_hardware_link}. Do you want to proceed with the setup of {integration}?
config_flow.matter_mobile_app: You need to use the NDX Tech Companion app on your mobile phone to commission Matter devices.

users.caption: Notendur
users.users_privileges_note: The user group feature is a work in progress. The user will be unable to administer the instance via the UI. We're still auditing all management API endpoints to ensure that they correctly limit access to administrators.

editor.caption: Skoða notanda

editor.local_only: Getur eingöngu skráð sig inn á staðarneti

application_credentials.caption: Application credentials
application_credentials.description: Manage the OAuth application credentials used by Integrations

editor.caption: Add credentials
editor.description: OAuth is used to grant NDX Tech access to information on other websites without giving a passwords. This mechanism is used by companies such as Spotify, Google, Withings, Microsoft, and Twitter.
editor.missing_credentials: Setting up {integration} requires configuring application credentials.
editor.name: Nafn
editor.client_id_helper: Public identifier of the OAuth application

remove_selected.confirm_text: Application credentials in use by an integration may not be removed.

thread.no_preferred_network: You don't have a preferred network yet.
thread.default_router_not_found: The border router used for Android + iOS credentials for this network could not be found.
thread.set_default_router: Use router for Android + iOS credentials
thread.no_routers_otbr_network: No border routers were found. Check your border router is configured correctly or reset it to factory settings.
thread.confirm_reset_border_router_text: NDX Tech will create a new Thread network. Any devices that are currently joined on this NDX Tech Thread network will need to be re-joined.
thread.confirm_set_dataset_border_router_text: NDX Tech will join an existing Thread network. Any devices that are currently joined on this NDX Tech Thread network will need to be re-joined.
thread.otbr_config_failed: Failed to configure the border router
thread.confirm_delete_dataset_text: This network will be removed from NDX Tech.
thread.change_channel_initiated_text: Rásarbreytingin hefur verið hafin og mun ljúka eftir {delay} mínútur.
thread.change_channel_multiprotocol_enabled_tex: Til að skipta um rás þegar þráðarútvarpið hefur virkjað multiprotocol, vinsamlegast notaðu vélbúnaðarstillingarvalmyndina.
thread.change_channel_range: Rás verður að vera á bilinu 11 til 26
thread.change_channel_text: Byrjaðu á rásarbreytingu fyrir þráðanetin þín. Þetta er háþróuð aðgerð og getur gert þráðanetin þín óvirk ef nýja rásin er stífluð. Það fer eftir núverandi netaðstæðum, hugsanlega eru mörg tæki þín ekki flutt yfir á nýju rásina og þurfa að tengjast aftur áður en þau byrja að virka aftur. Notaðu með varúð.

channel_dialog.title: Multiprotocol addon in use
channel_dialog.text: Zigbee and Thread share the same radio and must use the same channel. Change the channel of both networks by reconfiguring multiprotocol from the hardware menu.

add_device_page.pairing_mode: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device or {documentation_link} on how to do this.
add_device_page.discovered_text: Tæki munu birtast hér þegar þau hafa uppgötvast.
add_device_page.no_devices_found: Engin tæki fundust, vertu viss um að þau séu í pörunarham og haltu þeim vakandi á meðan Home Assistant er að leita.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.

cluster_commands.help_command_dropdown: Select a command to interact with.

groups.caption: Hópar
groups.group_details: Here are all the details for the selected Zigbee group.
groups.create_group_details: Enter the required details to create a new Zigbee group

group_binding.group_picker_help: Select a group to issue a bind command.
group_binding.cluster_selection_help: Select clusters to bind to the selected group.
group_binding.bind_button_help: Bind the selected group to the selected device clusters.
group_binding.unbind_button_help: Unbind the selected group from the selected device clusters.

change_channel_dialog.title: Change network channel
change_channel_dialog.migration_warning: Zigbee channel migration is an experimental feature and relies on devices on your network to support it. Device support for this feature varies and only a portion of your network may end up migrating!
change_channel_dialog.devices_will_rejoin: Devices will re-join the network over time. This may take a few minutes.

common.in_progress_inclusion_exclusion: Z-Wave JS er að leita að tækjum

messages_tx.label: Skilaboð móttekin
messages_tx.tooltip: Number of messages successfully sent to the controller

messages_rx.label: Skilaboð send
messages_rx.tooltip: Number of messages successfully received by the controller

messages_dropped_tx.label: Dropped messages TX
messages_dropped_tx.tooltip: Number of messages from the controller that were dropped by the host

messages_dropped_rx.label: Dropped messages RX
messages_dropped_rx.tooltip: Number of outgoing messages that were dropped because they could not be sent

nak.label: NAK
nak.tooltip: Number of messages that the controller did not accept

can.label: CAN
can.tooltip: Number of collisions while sending a message to the controller

timeout_ack.label: Timeout ACK
timeout_ack.tooltip: Number of transmission attempts where an ACK was missing from the controller

timeout_response.label: Timeout response
timeout_response.tooltip: Number of transmission attempts where the controller response did not come in time

timeout_callback.label: Timeout callback
timeout_callback.tooltip: Number of transmission attempts where the controller callback did not come in time

device_info.custom_device_config: This device is using a custom device config file not provided by Z-Wave JS. If you want to use the default device config provided by Z-Wave JS, you must remove the custom device config file from the folder that Z-Wave JS is reading from.

NotStarted.title: Reset Controller to Factory Settings
NotStarted.body: If you decide to move forward, you will reset your controller to factory settings. As a result, the controller will forget all devices it is paired with and all Z-Wave devices for this network will be removed from NDX Tech. If there are any devices still paired with the controller when it is reset, they will have to go through the exclusion process before they can be re-paired. Would you like to continue?

InProgress.title: Resetting Controller
InProgress.body: Your controller is being reset and restarted. Wait until the process is complete before closing this dialog

Done.title: Controller Reset Complete
Done.body: Your controller has been reset to factory settings and has been restarted! You can now close this dialog.

hard_reset_controller.confirmation: This action cannot be undone unless you have an NVM backup from your controller.

commands_tx.label: Commands TX
commands_tx.tooltip: # of commands successfully sent to the node

commands_rx.label: Commands RX
commands_rx.tooltip: # of commands received from the node, including responses to sent commands

commands_dropped_tx.label: Commands dropped TX
commands_dropped_tx.tooltip: # of outgoing commands that were dropped because they could not be sent

commands_dropped_rx.label: Commands dropped RX
commands_dropped_rx.tooltip: # of commands from the node that were dropped by the host

timeout_response.label: Timeout response
timeout_response.tooltip: # of Get-type commands where the node's response did not come in time

rtt.label: RTT
rtt.tooltip: Average round-trip-time in ms of commands to this node

rssi.label: RSSI
rssi.tooltip: Average RSSI in dBm of frames received by this node

data_rate.label: Data rate
data_rate.tooltip: The used data rate for this route

repeaters.label: Repeaters + RSSI
repeaters.tooltip: Which nodes are repeaters for this route and their RSSI

rssi.label: RSSI
rssi.tooltip: The RSSI of the ACK frame received by the controller

route_failed_between.label: Route failed between
route_failed_between.tooltip: The nodes between which the transmission failed most recently

node_config.introduction: Manage and adjust device specific configuration parameters for the selected device
node_config.attribution: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
node_config.battery_device_notice: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
node_config.set_param_queued: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.

add_node.title: Bæta við Z-Wave hnúti
add_node.follow_device_instructions: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
add_node.qr_code_paragraph: If your device supports SmartStart you can scan the QR code for easy pairing.
add_node.inclusion_failed: The device could not be added.
add_node.provisioning_finished: The device has been added. Once you power it on, it will become available.
add_node.interview_started: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
add_node.interview_failed: The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

provisioned.confirm_unprovision_title: Are you sure you want to unprovision the device?
provisioned.confirm_unprovision_text: If you unprovision the device it will not be added to NDX Tech when it is powered on. If it is already added to NDX Tech, removing the provisioned device will not remove it from NDX Tech.

S2_Unauthenticated.title: S2 Óstaðfest
S2_Unauthenticated.description: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included

S0_Legacy.title: S0 Legacy
S0_Legacy.description: Example: Legacy door locks without S2 support

remove_node.title: Fjarlægja Z-Wave hnút
remove_node.introduction: Fjarlægðu tæki af Z-Wave netinu þínu og fjarlægðu tengd tæki og einingar úr Home Assistant.
remove_node.controller_in_exclusion_mode: Z-Wave stjórinn þinn er nú í útilokunarham.
remove_node.follow_device_instructions: Fylgdu leiðbeiningunum sem fylgdu tækinu þínu til að kveikja á útilokun í tækinu.
remove_node.exclusion_failed: Ekki tókst að fjarlægja hnútinn. Vinsamlegast athugaðu atburðaskrár fyrir frekari upplýsingar.
remove_node.exclusion_finished: Hnúturinn {id} hefur verið fjarlægður af Z-Wave netinu.

remove_failed_node.title: Remove a Failed Z-Wave device
remove_failed_node.introduction: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
remove_failed_node.in_progress: The device removal is in progress.
remove_failed_node.removal_finished: Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
remove_failed_node.removal_failed: The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.

reinterview_node.title: Re-interview a Z-Wave device
reinterview_node.introduction: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
reinterview_node.battery_device_warning: You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
reinterview_node.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
reinterview_node.in_progress: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
reinterview_node.interview_failed: The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

rebuild_network_routes.title: Rebuild routes for your Z-Wave network
rebuild_network_routes.introduction: Start rebuilding routes on your Z-Wave network. Rebuilding routes will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
rebuild_network_routes.traffic_warning: The rebuilding process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the rebuild is in progress.
rebuild_network_routes.in_progress: Rebuild of network routes is in progress. This will take some time.
rebuild_network_routes.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the rebuild of network routes will continue in the background.
rebuild_network_routes.rebuilding_routes_failed: Route rebuilding failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
rebuild_network_routes.rebuilding_routes_cancelled: Rebuilding network routes has been cancelled.

rebuild_node_routes.title: Rebuild routes for a Z-Wave device
rebuild_node_routes.introduction: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
rebuild_node_routes.traffic_warning: The route rebuilding process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the rebuilding is in progress.
rebuild_node_routes.rebuilding_routes_failed_check_logs: Additional information may be available in the logs.
rebuild_node_routes.routes_rebuild_in_progress: A Z-Wave routes rebuild is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before rebuilding routes for an individual device.

update_firmware.title: Uppfæra fastbúnað tækis
update_firmware.warning: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The NDX Tech and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?
update_firmware.warning_controller: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your controller if you do not use the right firmware files, or if you attempt to stop the firmware update before it completes. The NDX Tech and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your controller as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your controller. Would you still like to continue?
update_firmware.introduction: Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
update_firmware.introduction_controller: Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}. Note that once you start a firmware update, you MUST wait for the update to complete.
update_firmware.firmware_target_intro: Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update.
update_firmware.queued: The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
update_firmware.close_queued: If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
update_firmware.awake: The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
update_firmware.close: If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
update_firmware.in_progress: The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
update_firmware.confirm_abort: Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?

finished_status.try_again: To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
finished_status.done: The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
finished_status.done_controller: The firmware update is complete! Your controller is being restarted and your network will temporarily be unavailable.

logs.title: Z-Wave JS Logs
logs.subscribed_to_logs: Subscribed to Z-Wave JS log messages…

manage_fabrics.title: Connected fabrics
manage_fabrics.fabrics: Manage the fabrics that have access to this device.
manage_fabrics.remove_fabric_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove the {fabric} from the device? You will not be able to control/access the device from that ecosystem/fabric after this action!
manage_fabrics.remove_fabric_failed_text: The action did not succeed, check the logs for more information.

reinterview_node.title: Re-interview a Matter device
reinterview_node.introduction: Perform a full re-interview of a Matter device. Use this feature only if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
reinterview_node.battery_device_warning: You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
reinterview_node.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
reinterview_node.in_progress: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
reinterview_node.interview_failed: The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

ping_node.title: Ping a Matter device
ping_node.introduction: Perform a (server-side) ping on your Matter device on all its (known) IP-addresses.
ping_node.battery_device_warning: Note that especially for battery powered devices this can take a a while. You may need to up powered devices before starting the pinging to speed up the process. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ping_node.in_progress: The device is being pinged. This may take some time.
ping_node.ping_failed: The device ping failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

open_commissioning_window.title: Share device
open_commissioning_window.introduction: Enable commissioning mode on the device to pair it to another Matter controller.
open_commissioning_window.in_progress: We're communicating with the device. This may take some time.
open_commissioning_window.failed: The command failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
open_commissioning_window.success: Your device can now be added to another Matter controller, scan the QR code below or enter the sharing code in the app of the controller you want to add your device to.

tips.join: Vertu með í samfélaginu okkar á {forums}, {twitter} , {discord} , {blog} eða {newsletter}
tips.media_storage: You can add network storage to your NDX Tech instance in the {storage} panel.

analytics.caption: Greining
analytics.description: Fræðast meira um að hvernig á að betrumbæta Home Assistant

base.title: Basic analytics
base.description: This includes information about your system.

usage.title: Notkun
usage.description: Details of what you use with NDX Tech

statistics.title: Tölfræðileg gögn
statistics.description: Counts containing total number of datapoints.

diagnostics.title: Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Share crash reports when unexpected errors occur.

analytics.need_base_enabled: You need to enable basic analytics for this option to be available
analytics.intro: Share anonymized information from your installation to help make NDX Tech better and help us convince manufacturers to add local control and privacy-focused features.

network.caption: Net

supervisor.title: Configure network interfaces
supervisor.warning: If you are changing the Wi-Fi, IP or gateway addresses, you might lose the connection!
supervisor.unsaved: You have unsaved changes, these will get lost if you change tabs, do you want to continue?

hostname.title: Host Name
hostname.description: The name your instance will have on your network

network.network_adapter_info: Configure which network adapters integrations will use. Currently this setting only affects multicast traffic. A restart is required for these settings to apply.

datadisk.title: Move data disk
datadisk.description: You are currently using ''{current_path}'' as data disk. Moving the data disk will reboot your device and it's estimated to take {time} minutes. Your NDX Tech installation will not be accessible during this period. Do not disconnect the power during the move!
datadisk.no_devices_text: There is no suitable external device found. The storage capacity of the external data disk must be larger than the storage capacity of the existing disk.
datadisk.moving_desc: Rebooting and moving data disk. Please have patience.

not_supported.title: The operating system does not support network storage
not_supported.supervised: Network storage is not supported on this host
not_supported.os: To use network storage you need to run at least NDX Tech Operating System {version}

name.title: Nafn
name.description: This name will be shown to you in the UI, and will also be the name of the folder created on your system

share.title: Remote share
share.description: This is the name of the share you created on your storage server

server.title: Netþjónn
server.description: This is the domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the storage server you want to connect to

default_backup_mount.title: Default backup location
default_backup_mount.description: This will be the default location for backups

path.title: Remote share path
path.description: This is the path of the remote share on your storage server

type.title: Samskiptahamur
type.description: This determines how to communicate with the storage server

usage.title: Notkun
usage.description: This determines how the share is intended to be used

version.title: Samba/Windows (CIFS) útgáfa
version.description: This choses the version of the protocol to use

username.title: Notandanafn
username.description: This is your username for the samba share

password.title: Lykilorð
password.description: This is your password for the samba share

errors.invalid_name: Invalid name, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores

warnings.not_recomeded_cifs_version: The selected CIFS version is not recommended to use, you should only use this if you have problems with auto and your server does not support version 2.1 or newer

system_health.caption: Heilbrigði kerfis
system_health.description: Status, metrics, and integration startup time
